July 17, 1915 D Penygroes Contest (Class A)
Penygroes Contest (Class A) 10 Test Piece Contest Penygroes Contest penygroes-contest-class-a

I Lombardi
Brynycwar Grounds, Penygroes, Llanelli, Carmarthenshire 4th annual contest promoted by Penygroes Band. Prizes - 1st £12 and shield, 2nd £6, 3rd £3. 7 bands competed.
